mapper.insert: insert into doctor_table(d_number, d_id, d_pw, d_name, d_date, d_phone, d_email, d_gender) values(#{d_number},#{d_id},#{d_pw},#{d_name},#{d_date},#{d_phone},#{d_email},#{d_gender})
mapper.select: select * from doctor_table order by d_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select * from doctor_table where d_id=#{d_id} and d_pw=#{d_pw}
